directions: In a medium bowl, stir together the cream cheese and margarine until well blended. Mix in the green olives and garlic powder. Shape into a ball, and roll in chopped walnuts to coat. Refrigerate for at least 30 minutes before serving, but preferably overnight. Serve with an assortment of crackers.
ingredients: 1 (5 ounce) jar pimento-stuffed green olives, drained and minced
title: Festive Olive Cheese Ball
